attributes.action: Prevent the BBC from showing the Manchester United game in every round of the F.A. Cup
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC seem to have shown the Manchester United tie in every round of the F.A. cup for as long as I can remember. If they are unable to see that other interesting games are available and that not everyone in the country is a United supporter then they must not be allowed to select the tie in every round.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
